languages.text: "Ты виновен и перед культом Механикус, и передо мной, и смерть — слишком легкое наказание. Ты искупишь вину, служа мне, и через меня — Империуму".
"I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Ты виновен и перед культом Механикус, и передо мной, и смерть — слишком легкое наказание. Ты искупишь вину, служа мне, и через меня — Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "I find you guilty, and your offence to the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius warrants punishment more severe than death. You will atone for your crimes by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

"I find you guilty, and your offence to the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius warrants punishment more severe than death. You will atone for your crimes by serving me and therefore the Imperium."
"I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."
"I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."
"I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

languages.text: 「機械教団とフォン・ヴァランシウス家に対する不敬で有罪とする。あなたの罪は死よりも重い罰に値する。私へ、ひいては帝国に仕えることで償うように」
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「機械教団とフォン・ヴァランシウス家に対する不敬で有罪とする。あなたの罪は死よりも重い罰に値する。私へ、ひいては帝国に仕えることで償うように」

languages.text: “你对机械修会与冯·瓦兰修斯家族犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，本该受到比死刑更加严厉的惩罚。不过，你可以通过为我服务来赎罪，这样也算是在为帝国效力。”
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “你对机械修会与冯·瓦兰修斯家族犯下了不可饶恕的罪行，本该受到比死刑更加严厉的惩罚。不过，你可以通过为我服务来赎罪，这样也算是在为帝国效力。”

languages.text: "Ich befinde Euch für Vergehen gegen den Kult Mechanicus und das Haus Valancius schuldig. Eure Verbrechen erfordern eine schlimmere Strafe als den Tod. Ihr werdet büßen, indem Ihr mir und damit dem Imperium dient."
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Ich befinde Euch für Vergehen gegen den Kult Mechanicus und das Haus Valancius schuldig. Eure Verbrechen erfordern eine schlimmere Strafe als den Tod. Ihr werdet büßen, indem Ihr mir und damit dem Imperium dient."

languages.text: « Je vous déclare coupable d'offenses à l'encontre du Culte Mechanicus et de la maison von Valancius qui appellent un châtiment plus sévère que la mort. Vous expierez vos crimes en me servant et en servant l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous déclare coupable d'offenses à l'encontre du Culte Mechanicus et de la maison von Valancius qui appellent un châtiment plus sévère que la mort. Vous expierez vos crimes en me servant et en servant l'Imperium. »

languages.text: «Le declaro culpable de delitos contra el Culto Mechanicus y la casa von Valancius. Sus crímenes exigen una pena más severa que la capital. Expiará su culpa sirviéndome a mí y, por consiguiente, al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Le declaro culpable de delitos contra el Culto Mechanicus y la casa von Valancius. Sus crímenes exigen una pena más severa que la capital. Expiará su culpa sirviéndome a mí y, por consiguiente, al Imperium».

languages.text: "Seni, Cult Mechanicus ve von Valancius Hanesi'ne karşı işlediğin suçlardan ötürü suçlu buluyorum. Suçlarının bedeli olarak ölümden daha ağır bir ceza çekeceksin. Bana, dolayısıyla da İmparatorluk'a hizmet ederek kefaretini ödeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "I find you guilty of offences against the Cult Mechanicus and House von Valancius. Your crimes warrant punishment more severe than death. You will atone by serving me and therefore the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Seni, Cult Mechanicus ve von Valancius Hanesi'ne karşı işlediğin suçlardan dolayı suçlu buluyorum. Suçlarının bedeli olarak ölümden daha ağır bir ceza çekeceksin. Bu doğrultuda bana ve dolayısıyla İmparatorluk'a hizmet ederek kefaretini ödeyeceksin."
